sentences.en: A passport that is out of date is invalid.
At best Nella would be an invalid; at worst she would die.
sentences.cn: 内拉往好里说会落下残疾，往坏处说可能会生命不保。

sentences.en: Dr. Smith looked in on the invalid the day before yesterday.
sentences.cn: 史密斯大夫前天去看望那个病人.

sentences.en: He had to look after his invalid brother.
sentences.cn: 他不得不照看他有病的弟弟.

sentences.en: I hate being treated as an invalid.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌被人当作伤病号对待。

sentences.en: I resented being treated as an invalid.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌别人把我当病人看待。

sentences.en: Margaret resides with her invalid mother in a London suburb.
sentences.cn: 玛格丽特同她病弱的母亲住在伦敦郊区。

sentences.en: The disease changed him from an athlete to an invalid.
sentences.cn: 疾病将他从一名运动员变为病号.

sentences.en: The invalid found solace in music.
sentences.cn: 那病人从音乐中得到安慰.

sentences.en: The invalid received vicarious pleasure from reading travel stories.
sentences.cn: 这个病人从阅读游记中得到共鸣之乐.

sentences.en: The trial was stopped and the results declared invalid.
sentences.cn: 审判被中止，判决结果被宣布无效。

sentences.en: We cannot accept liability if you are refused entry because of invalid documents.
sentences.cn: 如果你因证件无效被拒入内，我们不承担责任。

sentences.en: We think that those arguments are rendered invalid by the hard facts on the ground.
sentences.cn: 我们认为那些论点当场即被确凿的事实驳倒了。

sentences.en: Without the right date stamped on it, your ticket will be invalid.
sentences.cn: 票上若没有加盖正确日期就是废票。

sentences.en: Your action has rendered our contract invalid.
sentences.cn: 你们的这种做法导致双方的合同失效.

trans.tran_cn: 无效的，不能成立的，有病的，病人用的
trans.tran_en: a contract, ticket, claim etc that is invalid is not legally or officially acceptable

trans.tran_cn: 病人，病号，残废者，伤病军人
trans.tran_en: someone who cannot look after themselves because of illness, old age, or injury

trans.tran_cn: 变得病弱，因病而奉命退役
使伤残，使退役，失去健康
